title: Prior acquisitions
context: [§323D-81] Prior acquisitions. Any acquisition of a hospital before July 20, 1998 and any acquisition in which an application for a certificate of need has been granted by the agency before July 20, 1998 is not subject to this part. [L 1998, c 257, pt of §1] Revision Note &ldquo;July 20, 1998&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this part&rdquo;.
